events.name: addStarsAmount

events.name: addStarsInterval
events.comment: Time between new star additions

events.name: meteorsWorth
events.comment: How much a meteor is worth in score

events.name: addMeteorsAmount
events.comment: Amount of meteors to be added each time

events.name: addMeteorsInterval
events.comment: Time between new meteor additions

events.name: livesPowerUpAmount
events.comment: Amount of extra lives per Extra Life PowerUp

events.name: fastFirePowerUpTime
events.comment: How long fast fire rate lasts

events.name: slowPowerUpStrength
events.comment: By how much the game will be slowed down

events.name: addPowerUpInterval
events.comment: Time between new power up additions

events.name: initialPlayerLives
events.comment: How many extra lives the player starts with

events.name: increaseScoreInterval
events.comment: Every how many sconds the player's score should increase

events.name: timedScoreIncreaseWorth
events.comment: How many points the player gets each defined interval of time

events.name: minimumGameSpeed
events.comment: How slow the game can go

events.name: speedIncrement
events.comment: Amount of speed to be added each time

events.name: playerName
events.comment: Player's name

events.name: playerHighScore
events.comment: Player's highest score of all time

events.name: playerScore
events.comment: Player's Score (objective)

events.name: playerFastFiring
events.comment: Player's fire rate increased

events.name: gameSpeed
events.comment: How fast the game (stars, meteors and items) move

events.name: playerLives
events.comment: Player's Lives

children.text: call startGame function, which sets up many variables and checks if there's a saved High Score
If not on mobile, destroy touch input buttons
Each second, if player is alive, increase score by the default value and increase the game speed up to a defined value
When the High Score value has been loaded, set playerHighScore to it
Delete Stars that hit the bottom of the screen
Delete Meteors that hit the bottom of the screen
Delete PowerUps that hit the bottom of the screen
Stop flashing animation on start of layout
Change player's animation to ready when player is done reloading
If flashing is playing, stop it after 1.0s
Player has successfully shot a meteor

actions.text: Destroy both elements and create particles
Update player's score. The bigger the meteor, the more points the player gets

children.text: Player was hit by a meteor

actions.text: Destroy all Meteors and PowerUps. Flash player

children.text: No more lives left? It's game over, buddy.
If there's a new High Score, save it to local storage. Show Game Over screen

actions.text: Transform AJAX data to JSON format

children.text: When the score has been set, go to the menu

actions.text: Destroy PowerUp and add effect to Player/Game
